GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiTableCell class.

GetRowIndex.name: GetRowIndex
GetRowIndex.description: Returns an index of the parent row.

GetParentRow.name: GetParentRow
GetParentRow.description: Returns a parent row of the current cell.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Returns a parent table of the current cell.

AddRows.name: AddRows
AddRows.description: Adds the new rows to the current table.

params.name: nCount
params.description: Count of rows to be added.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Specifies if the new rows will be added before or after the current cell.

AddColumns.name: AddColumns
AddColumns.description: Adds the new columns to the current table.

params.name: nCount
params.description: Count of columns to be added.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Specifies if the new columns will be added before or after the current cell.

RemoveColumn.name: RemoveColumn
RemoveColumn.description: Removes a column containing the current cell.

RemoveRow.name: RemoveRow
RemoveRow.description: Removes a row containing the current cell.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: Searches for a scope of a table cell object. The search results are a collection of ApiRange objects.

params.name: sText
params.description: Search string.

params.name: isMatchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not.

Split.name: Split
Split.description: Splits the cell into a given number of rows and columns.

params.name: nRow
params.description: Count of rows into which the cell will be split.

params.name: nCol
params.description: Count of columns into which the cell will be split.

SetCellPr.name: SetCellPr
SetCellPr.description: Sets the cell properties to the current cell.

params.name: oApiTableCellPr
params.description: The properties that will be set to the current table cell.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Applies the text settings to the entire contents of the current cell.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The properties that will be set to the current table cell text.

Clear.name: Clear
Clear.description: Clears the content from the current cell.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Adds a paragraph or a table or a blockLvl content control using its position in the cell.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the current element will be added.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position.

SetBackgroundColor.name: SetBackgroundColor
SetBackgroundColor.description: Sets the background color to the current table cell.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: bNone
params.description: Defines that background color will not be set.

SetColumnBackgroundColor.name: SetColumnBackgroundColor
SetColumnBackgroundColor.description: Sets the background color to all cells in the column containing the current cell.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: bNone
params.description: Defines that background color will not be set.

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specifies the shading applied to the contents of the table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type which will be applied to the contents of the current table cell.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: The true value disables the table cell contents shading.

SetCellMarginBottom.name: SetCellMarginBottom
SetCellMarginBottom.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the bottom extent of the cell contents and the border of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space below the bottom extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null, then default table cell bottom margin will be used, otherwise the table cell bottom margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellMarginLeft.name: SetCellMarginLeft
SetCellMarginLeft.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the left extent of the cell contents and the border of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space to the left extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null, then default table cell left margin will be used, otherwise the table cell left margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellMarginRight.name: SetCellMarginRight
SetCellMarginRight.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the right extent of the cell contents and the border of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space to the right extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null, then default table cell right margin will be used, otherwise the table cell right margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellMarginTop.name: SetCellMarginTop
SetCellMarginTop.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the upper extent of the cell contents and the border of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space above the upper extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null, then default table cell top margin will be used, otherwise the table cell top margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellBorderBottom.name: SetCellBorderBottom
SetCellBorderBottom.description: Sets the border which will be displayed at the bottom of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell bottom border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell bottom border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the bottom part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetCellBorderLeft.name: SetCellBorderLeft
SetCellBorderLeft.description: Sets the border which will be displayed to the left of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell left border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell left border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the left part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetCellBorderRight.name: SetCellBorderRight
SetCellBorderRight.description: Sets the border which will be displayed to the right of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell right border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell right border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the right part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetCellBorderTop.name: SetCellBorderTop
SetCellBorderTop.description: Sets the border which will be displayed at the top of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell top border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell top border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the top part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetWidth.name: SetWidth
SetWidth.description: Sets the preferred width to the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of the width value from one of the available width values types.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The table cell width value measured in positive integers.

SetVerticalAlign.name: SetVerticalAlign
SetVerticalAlign.description: Specifies the vertical alignment for the text contents within the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The available types of the vertical alignment for the text contents of the current table cell.

SetTextDirection.name: SetTextDirection
SetTextDirection.description: Specifies the direction of the text flow for this table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description:
The available types of the text direction in the table cell: "lrtb"

  • text direction left-to-right moving from top to bottom, "tbrl" - text direction top-to-bottom moving from right to left, "btlr" - text direction bottom-to-top moving from left to right.

SetNoWrap.name: SetNoWrap
SetNoWrap.description: Specifies how the current table cell is laid out when the parent table is displayed in a document. This setting only affects the behavior of the cell when the {@link ApiTablePr#SetTableLayout} table layout for this table is set to use the "autofit" algorithm.

params.name: isNoWrap
params.description: The true value means that the current table cell will not be wrapped in the parent table.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiTableCellPr object into the JSON object.
